intro: Der folgende Armeeorganisationsplan ermöglicht es eine Armee Emperor's Children Traitor Legion. The Emperor's Children are a fast moving, agile army relying on daemons to bolster their relatively small Verbände.
strategy: Chaos Space Marine Armeen haben einen Strategiewert von 4.
Initiative: All Emperor's Children Core, Support und the Chosen formation have an Initiative Rating of 1+. Alle anderen Verbände haben eine Initiativewert von 2+.

formations.name: Emperor's Children Retinue
formations.units: Ein Noise Lord, drei Noise Marines, drei Chaos Space Marines, Daemonic Pact

about: EA-R Emperor's Children is based on the NetEA version of the list. Apart from all the changes inherited from Black Legion list, there are a few significant differences. It is no longer possible to play the list without Noise Marines, but it is also not possible to play a purely Furchtlos list. The list gets a Greater Daemon Pool point für free, to compensate für the loss of flexibility that the Black Legion has. Emperor's Children Terminatoren (Sirenshriek Terminatoren) are now Furchtlos, mostly für thematic reasons. The Questor und the Subjugator have slightly different loadouts that are closer to the fluff, while the Ritter Verbände are no longer 0-1 but are much smaller. The Höllenritter have slightly better stats to bring them in line with the Hell-Scourges. The 'Debaser' Defiler has been introduced from the E-UK list. The Chaos Thunderhawk costs 25 Punkte more, like in Codex Astartes.
